metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28734 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds write when handling split HTTP headers; When handling splitHTTP headers, GRUB2 HTTP code accidentally moves its internal data bufferpoint by one position. This can lead to a out-of-bound write further whenparsing the HTTP request, writing a NULL byte past the buffer. It'sconceivable that an attacker controlled set of packets can lead tocorruption of the GRUB2's internal memory metadata.

criterions.comment: grub2 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
grub2-unsigned: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
grub2-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
